sentences.en: Bradycardia during intraoperative device testing is no reason to abort the operation.
sentences.cn: 在手术中的装置测试期间出现心搏徐缓,不是放弃这种手术的理由.

sentences.en: Brucellosis is a disease that causes fetuses to abort in cattle.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士菌病是一种可以导致牲畜胎儿夭折的疾病.

sentences.en: DATA : Not ready reading right nostril. Abort, Retry, Fail?
sentences.cn: 右鼻孔读取尚未就绪. 放弃 、 重试 、 失败?

sentences.en: Date error reading drive A Abort, Retry, Ignore, Fail?
sentences.cn: A驱动器读取错误,异常结束 、 试 、 顾错误状态继续执行还是系统调用失败继续执行?

sentences.en: Date error writing drive A Abort, Retry, Ignore, Fail?
sentences.cn: A驱动器写错误,异常结束 、 试 、 顾错误状态继续执行还是系统调用失败继续执行?

sentences.en: Frequently the basal ovule, which is the last one to be fertilized would abort.
sentences.cn: 最后受精的基生胚珠经常败育.

sentences.en: How abort your holiday plans? Did you make reservations already?
sentences.cn: 假期准备得如何? 你预约好了吗 ?

sentences.en: Installation of this product requires system administrator privileges. Setup will now abort.
sentences.cn: 安装此软件需要具有系统管理员权限. 现在安装终止退出.

sentences.en: Objects created during commit or abort phase of synchronous event are read - only.
sentences.cn: 同步事件的提交或终止阶段创建的对象为只读.

sentences.en: One of two keys needed to abort the rocket launch sequence.
sentences.cn: 要停止火箭发射程序必须要有两支钥匙中的一支.

sentences.en: Since you don't want to relocate your WC, just abort this dialog.
sentences.cn: 当然你不是想重定位你的工作拷贝, 取消这个对话框就行了.

sentences.en: The disease causes pregnant animals to abort.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病会导致怀孕的动物流产。

sentences.en: The doctor had to abort the baby.
The rescue mission had to be aborted.
There was an error adding the CD, the upgrade will abort.
sentences.cn: 添加光盘时出错将会导致升级中止.

sentences.en: Well, well,'said the Rat.'I suppose we should think abort getting home.
sentences.cn: “好了好了, ” 水鼠说, “ 我想我们应该准备回家了. ”

sentences.en: With this button the user can abort the audio sequence.
sentences.cn: 用户可以用该按钮终止音频序列.

words.tran_cn: 流产；堕胎；夭折；发育不全

trans.tran_en: to deliberately end a  pregnancy  when the baby is still too young to live
